description: Maps code changes to required documentation updates

mappings.description: New commands must be documented in README and QUICKSTART
mappings.suggestion: Add command to README.md command list and QUICKSTART.md quick reference

mappings.description: New skills must update skill count in README and marketplace.json
mappings.suggestion: Update skill count in README.md (e.g., '9 skills' â†’ '10 skills') and marketplace.json metrics.skills

mappings.description: New agents must update agent count in README and marketplace.json
mappings.suggestion: Update agent count in README.md and marketplace.json metrics.agents

mappings.description: New hooks must be documented in README and STRICT-MODE guide
mappings.suggestion: Document hook purpose, when it runs, and what it enforces

mappings.description: New libraries must be documented in LIBRARIES.md and count updated in CLAUDE.md
mappings.suggestion: Add library entry to LIBRARIES.md with description, version, issue number. Update library count in CLAUDE.md Component Counts section.

mappings.description: Setup script changes may affect installation instructions
mappings.suggestion: Review and update installation steps in QUICKSTART.md and README.md

mappings.description: Template changes may affect configuration examples
mappings.suggestion: Update configuration examples and strict mode documentation

mappings.description: Version changes require release notes and README update
mappings.suggestion: Update version in README.md header and add release notes to UPDATES.md

mappings.description: Marketplace metadata changes should sync with README
mappings.suggestion: Ensure README.md reflects updated metrics, description, or tags
